import React from 'react'; import moment from 'moment'; import { Col, Container, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import { Session } from 'bc-react-session'; import { HashLinkContainer } from 'components'; const session = Session.getSession(); const CaseCapture = props => { return (
  1. Dashboard
  2. Cases
  3. Capture

Case #DF032AZ00022

Captured on {moment().format('MMMM DD, YYYY')}

{session.payload.user.first_name} {session.payload.user.last_name}

{session.payload.user.user_role.description}

{session.payload.facility.name}

Tel No: {session.payload.user.mobile}

Email: {session.payload.user.email}

  • Country {session.payload.facility.subdistrict.district.province.country.name}
  • Province {session.payload.facility.subdistrict.district.province.name}
  • District {session.payload.facility.subdistrict.district.name}
  • Capture on {moment().format('MMMM DD, YYYY')}

Patient Information

Please enter patient information below and save!
); }; export default CaseCapture;
